formatted_address: 11 Northshore Dr, Marina Country Club, Singapore 828670
name: Oodles Learning @ Punggol

reviews.text:
Coach Nicole is vey clear in her explanation and  systematic in her teaching methodology. She is very approachable and sincerely cares for her students.
Most importantly, her  encouragement and belief in her students‚Äô potential plays a crucial role in building up their self confidence, leading them to love the subject and motivating them to work towards self improvement.

Thank you coach Nicole üôèüèΩ

The best math class and teacher, coach Nicole, I have ever had. She made me fall in love with Math as I figured out interesting bits of Math with my classmates. From primary 6 till secondary 4, learning Math was exhilarating under her guidance. Her passion for Math together with her patience for her students make her lessons a terrific one. My confidence in subjects related to Math has been greatly boosted due to the practices we do during and outside of classes.
teachers and staff are really nice and professional in their field of work, and train me for o levels with many challenging questions. it‚Äôs been a good 6 years here!

My daughter Carrie doesn't like Maths and always get grade C. She has improved tremendously after she joined Oodles at Punggol branch. I‚Äôm surprise that now she likes math subject. She got an A in her PSLE math. Thanks to Coach Nicole for her guidance and perseverance. Highly recommended to attend Oodles Learning.

I am a student that has attended oodles learning and I must say I am impressed by the amazing effort put in by the teachers to teach and make sure the students are able to learn effectively and efficiently. I have also benefitted a lot from this centre thanks to coach Nicole who was very patient with me and constantly helped me when in need. This has allowed me to achieve terrific results. Additionally, the lessons are highly engaging and enjoyable and overall a great learning centre
